name: Mathin' Money
description:
In this game, you take the role of a cashier in charge of getting customers the correct amount of change. This game is a prototype designed for our Interactive Media Studio class at Harrisburg University of Science and Technology, with the purpose of building an effective teaching tool to enforce a PA Common Core standard. In this case, the Common Core standard is in 2nd grade math, being the ability to count and make change with coins and paper currency.

Installation Instructions:

Just unzip the folder, and click on Mathin' Money.exe to start!
